title: Clarify FieldCache API around the use of NumericDocValues fields
description: Spinoff from this thread: http://lucene.markmail.org/thread/wxs6bzf2ul6go4pg. FieldCache (and friends) API javadocs need some improvements.

comments.content: Initial patch improving "longs" javadocs. I think same improvements can be done to the other types as well (float, int etc.), but I'd like to get feedback on the wording first.
